Phil then collected 3 per month the following year, and since there are 12 months in a year that was 3*12=<<3*12=36>>36 coins added
Phil then collected 1 every third month, and since there are 12 months that means he collected one every 12/3=4.0 months, for 4.0 coins added
Before he lost a quarter of his coins, Phil had 1000+36+4.0 coins, or <<1000+36+4.0=1040.0>>1040.0 coins in total.
Losing a quarter of 1040.0 coins means Phill lost 1040.0/4=<<1040.0/4=260.0>>260.0 coins
That means Phil had 1040.0-260.0= <<1040.0-260.0=780.0>>780.0 coins remaining
